changelog: v2.1: Major expansion — 53 new pools across 18 new pairs. Tier 1 (10 pairs): nUSDC/USDC.e stablecoin, UNI/WETH, SAND/WETH, SAND/USDT, LINK/USDT, WBTC/USDT, UNI/USDT, AAVE/USDT, CRV/WETH, SUSHI/WETH. Tier 2 (8 WMATIC-quoted pairs): WBTC, CRV, UNI, LINK, SAND, AAVE, DAI, GRT. All factory-derived. Previous: v2.0 native USDC expansion.

pools.notes: Deep liquidity but SOLE pool — no cross-DEX counterpart, zero arb possible. Demoted to monitoring 2026-01-30. Re-activate when V2 or additional DEX pool added for LINK/USDC.
SushiV3 cross-DEX — 0.2% impact@$5K, $4991 returned. Deep stablecoin.

fee_tiers.reason: Systematic phantom liquidity across all 1% pools on Polygon. 100% Quoter rejection rate.

observation.comment: v1.7: Both observation pools promoted to whitelist with max_trade_size_usd caps (adaptive sizing).

native_usdc_candidates.comment: ACTIVATED in v1.6. All 9 pools moved to whitelist.pools with status=active. Dual-USDC support implemented via QUOTE_TOKEN_ADDRESS_NATIVE env var.
